meta.evidence: \begin{tabular}{l} s/-PollPDU Parameter value of pollPDU for RLC AM for NR sidelink communications, seeTS 38.322 [4]. Value ms 5 means 5 ms , value ms 10 means 10 ms and so on. \end{tabular}
